name: The Last Ledger
description:
The world has been devastated by a viral outbreak, turning most of humanity into zombies. The player takes on the role of a lone soldier stationed at a military base, who must clear the base of the undead in order to establish a safe haven. Armed with a growing arsenal of weapons, the player must fend off endless waves of zombies as they uncover the secrets of the outbreak and the research of Dr. Rachel Hayes.

As the player progresses, they will collect items and documents scattered throughout the base that give more context and information about the virus and Dr. Hayes' research. These items and documents will provide insight into the events leading up to the outbreak and give the player a sense of discovery and progress.

The player must balance their resources and survive as long as possible, all while dealing with the constant threat of the zombie horde. With realistic graphics and intense gameplay, this post-apocalyptic shooter will test the player's skills and put their survival instincts to the ultimate test. Can you survive in this dangerous new world and uncover the truth behind the outbreak?

Current Game Stage:

The current format of the game is Endless wave zombies, showing the in-game items that can either be purchased or sold via the website (https://www.aeoncolony.com).

To enable the earnings you need to be logged into your Aeon Account, creating an account is simple, and can easily be created at https://www.aeoncolony.com.

There is a total of 5 hidden items in the game, these are not marked, so  you will need to be on the look out, your character will mention about something hidden when your close by to one, just look for things that are out of place or do not belong.

To be able to find the items you must be logged into your Aeon Account, as these will become available and shown to you in your account portfolio explaining more about the item.

Input Actions.

The current input actions are as followed:

Keyboard:
WASD to move,
C key to Crouch,
Left Shift  to Sprint,
P to pause the game,
F to Interact.

Mouse:
Move mouse for camera,
Left button to fire,
Right button to aim.
